website_summaries.verdict: Phiaton's BT 330 NC headphones offer powerful Bluetooth audio, but noise cancellation is merely average.
pros: Powerful audio performance with solid bass response and very crisp highs
Can be used in wired mode
Can connect to multiple devices at once
cons: On-ear controls can be tricky to operate

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stylish,  sound headphones
customer_reviews.text: I've used many different headphones from many different manufacturers. Many people might buy bears or other well known brands, but many of the popular branded headphones are overpriced, and soind, and quality are not equal to its price. Phiaton BY 330 is very good features. BY 330 has a long battery life ( over 25 hours without noise cancellation, and 14 to 15 with noise cancellation on) great sound, very sturdy, and stylish. Did not give five stars cause these headphones press ears a bit too tight...overall, an awesome headphones. However, wired doesn't work that well..
customer_reviews.author: Rz

customer_reviews.title: Detailed listening experience
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly detailed sound with powerful bass all in a lightweight package.
customer_reviews.author: BlakGreg

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Exceptional Noise Cancelling, not for active wear, good battery life
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and fantastic Noise Cancelling. The only reason for 4 stars is they are not very suitable for active wearing. A little heavy for much movement. But if you are sitting on a plane or in a noisy office, these are awesome. Bluetooth quality is better then most. Battery life was better then expected. The on-phone controls are simple once you learn how to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Behrman

customer_reviews.title: Pair easily. Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Pair easily. Great sound. Love them except for the fact that the EarPads have started to tear. Would love to know a fix or where to buy replacement pads.
customer_reviews.author: Sir John

customer_reviews.title: ... all U name it I've tried it Phone Calls good plus Better thatn some of the 500$ Noise cx ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried all U name it I've tried it Phone Calls good plus Better thatn some of the 500$ Noise cx way good enough Light Comfortable Features work well inc pass thru Get 2
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Best bluetooth headphone ever got!Good shape Good battery Good hifi quality Good nc
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted About 10 Uses
customer_reviews.text: I've used these less than 10 times and the ear pad completely fell apart. There weren't any rips, it just came off. I used the case bag and packed it lightly in my purse for travel twice and the other handful of times I just used them at home. They way they are made appears like there is no ridge or lip to even apply super glue so I guess these will be going in the trash unless I duct tape.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: I love them. Hold a long charge and sound better ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fabulous headphones. I love them. Hold a long charge and sound better than Bose. Really great and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Good value headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good sound and compact style. For the price and quality these headphones are a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Kanaya

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Overall
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are pretty lightweight, and if you’re sitting around while using the, you may forget that you have them on. I would personally prefer for the ear cushions to be a little larger, because if I don’t set them right, they feel weird on my ears. They are definitely not lightweight enough to take them out on a jog or some other physical activity! The battery seems to hold a good, long charge, and they pair with any Bluetooth device without any issues. They can also connect with a cord, which is an unusual bonus when it comes to Bluetooth headsets! The sound quality is crisp and clear, with great bass to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Dipped in Ink

customer_reviews.title: no connection
customer_reviews.text: These Bluetooth headphones felt great to wear. They're comfortable, and I was hoping to get some real use out of them. However, no matter what I did, I couldn't get them to connect - to anything. I followed the directions and I tried several different devices in my house, but nothing worked. I would say they were probably broken when they got here, but I can only discuss my experience with this pair. As it stands, I'm thoroughly disappointed with these.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice quality headphones. The noise-cancelling function works especially well. The sound is great. The headphones look nice and have a sleek design. I like that it comes with a simple drawstring case.
customer_reviews.author: samiam

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of headphones with effective noise cancelling and decent sound.
customer_reviews.author: K Family Reviewers

customer_reviews.title: Very fast connection
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Used for a long time. Exceptionally fast connection. 1. Easy to use 2. Light, not heavy 3. Sound doesn't leak 4. Good sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: After four months the earpad around both earpieces began to separate from the plastic base. I've tried to hold together with tape but that has resulted in a black adhesive mess. Not what I expected from a relatively expensive set of earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Barry M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They have better sound canceling than beats studios 2.0 and have really clear sound
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality good, comfort a bit lacking
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality from these headphones is nicely balances and clear. I would prefer a larger ear cup, even for an on ear phone. To me these are a bit tight and get a bit tiring to wear but tolerable.The size is convenient for carrying. Bluetooth easy to pair and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl L. Katz

customer_reviews.title: Broke right away.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have decent sound quality. However, very poor quality and materials used. Snapped at the head band on my 5th use. See pictures. Sent it in for repair instead they sent me someone else's return in gross shape that has been obviously previously used. Company did not respond back to me. Update: Second pair also broke.
customer_reviews.author: Dodosh

product_meta.title: Phiaton BT 330 NC Over The Ear Qualcomm Bluetooth Headphones – Active Noise Cancelling Earphones with Wireless Headphone Mic, Multi-Device Pairing, and Extended Battery Life
feature_bullets: ACTIVE NOISE CANCELLING HEADPHONES: ANC headphones with active noise-cancelling technology reduce 95% of external interference from common. Music lovers rejoice with these audiophile headphones that prevent.

EXTENDED LIFE: Phiaton’s Everplay-X extension allows you to continue listening when your battery life runs out. With Everyplay-X, Phiaton BT Wireless Headphones can be wired to play from devices that aren’t Bluetooth compatible.

MULTIPLE DEVICE PAIRING: Connect two Bluetooth devices simultaneously. Connect your smartphone, tablet, and MP3 player. Multiple device support guarantees you won’t miss an important call while using your Bluetooth headphones thanks to the Qualcomm Bluetooth chip.

LONG BATTERY LIFE: Phiaton BT 330 NC Wireless Earphones have a long battery life. Fully charged, they provide up to 30 hours of talk or music time. With Active Noise Cancellation turned on, they provide up to 18 hours of talk or music.
WARRANTY: Continue to enjoy your Phiaton BT Headphones long after the Amazon return period expires. All Phiaton Wireless Headphones and wireless products come with a one year warranty.
